name: bidorboo
description: The Best Way To Be your Own Manager

scripts.start: yarn install && cd server && yarn install && yarn run start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.dev-from-scratch: npm install && cd server && yarn install && cd.. && cd client && yarn install && cd.. && concurrently "npm run start-server-prod" "npm run start-client-prod"

author: Said Madi
